front.title: PCEP Extension for Native IP Network

abstract.t: This document defines the PCEP extension for CCDR application in Native IP network. The scenario and architecture of CCDR in native IP is described in [draft-ietf-teas-native-ip-scenarios] and [draft- ietf-teas-pce-native-ip]. This draft describes the key information that is transferred between PCE and PCC to accomplish the end2end traffic assurance in Native IP network under central control mode.
